Product title: Ginger Lily Farms Foaming Soap Dispenser, Refillable Plastic Pump Bottles for Liquid Hand Soap, 15 oz. Clear Bottle with White Pump, 2-Pack
Key Features: Foaming Hand Soap Dispensers: Specially designed for dispensing foaming hand soap, each refillable bottle holds 15 oz of liquid soap and features a clear design for easy monitoring of soap levels. | BPA Free Plastic Bottles: Crafted without harmful chemicals, these refillable bottles are a safe and non-toxic option for you and the environment. | Eco-Friendly Design: Refilling soap containers help reduce single-use plastic waste and promote sustainability. | Durable & Reusable: The sturdy pump dispenser is built to last, offering long-term use while minimizing waste. | Value Pack: Includes two 15 oz bottles, perfect for refilling and keeping your home or office stocked with eco-conscious hand soap dispensers.
comment 1: Works great with even thick hand soap.  And, the bottle stands up to hard water!  Great price, too! - Ida
comment 2: These are definitely worth the money. We were looking for a reliable, easy to use, foam soap dispenser that our kiddos (4, 2) can use but not risk breaking. This works very well and meets all of our needs! - Sean Conway
comment 3: Just what I was looking for. Great function at a good price - Jerry Burns
comment 4: I like this company because their soap products are high quality and without too many additives, especially SLS.The dispensers work well, no issues so far. I bought them for both the home and office. Buying all those individual, disposable hand soap bottles constantly like I used to got on my nerves and this solved the problem. - G. Stogel
comment 5: I filled them with 1/3 Castile soap and 2/3 filtered water.  The foam is great for washing hands. The containers are crystal clear and large enough to last a long time. I bought a second pair. - D C
